references: Related: CF 169991. Repealing: Ord 68462, Ord 68463, Ord 68464, Ord 68465, Ord 68466, Ord 68467, Ord 68468, Ord 68469, Ord 68470, Ord 70219
summary: An ordinance relating to unexpended balances in appropriations made from the Water Bonds 1937 Construction Fund and from the Water Bond Sinking Fund, and repealing the ordinances making such appropriations.
